sources.name: sinktable
sources.description: Current rows in DimProductCategory DW table

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.description: Close out the old version of the row

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	wildcardPaths:['*.*']) ~> sourcetable
source(output(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sinktable
sourcetable, sinktable lookup(sourcetable@ParentProductCategoryID == sinktable@ParentProductCategoryID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	desc(EndDate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> sourceWithSurrogate
codataWithDates split(isNull(ProductCategory),
	disjoint: false) ~> DoesRowExist@(NewRow, CurrentRow)
DoesRowExist@CurrentRow, sinktable exists(ProductCategoryID == sinktable@ProductCategory
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Name == sinktable@name
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ParentProductCategoryID == sinktable@ParentProductCategoryID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RowHasChanged
sourceWithSurrogate derive(StartDate = currentTimestamp(),
		EndDate = toTimestamp("9999-12-31 23:59:59"),
		RowStatusNew = "NEW",
		RowStatusChange = "CHANGE") ~> codataWithDates
RowHasChanged alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
DoesRowExist@NewRow sink(input(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategory = ProductCategoryID,
		name = DoesRowExist@NewRow@Name,
		ParentProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ParentProductCategoryID,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkNew
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProductCategory'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategory = ProductCategoryID,
		EndDate = StartDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkInactive
RowHasChanged sink(input(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategory = ProductCategoryID,
		name = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Name,
		ParentProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ParentProductCategoryID,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkChanges
